attributes.action: Dog theft - to be criminalised to kidnap
attributes.additional_details: I have met people who have had their pets stolen and the mental and emotional stress on them has been immense the criminal fraternity see this as a non impact crime to them (they will not be caught and if caught no penalty)  this attitude needs to be reversed
attributes.background:
For so many dogs are like children.  People become emotionally connected to their dog and if one is stolen it is like losing a child.

I want dog theft to reflect the laws of kidnap with similar penalties and a similar police response.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560216
